GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v4.14.300
GSD.description:
iio: trigger: sysfs: fix possible memory leak in iio_sysfs_trig_init()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.300 by commit 5a39382aa5411d64b25a71516c2c7480aab13bb7, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 1f785681a87068f123d3e23da13b2c55ab4f93ac. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iio: trigger: sysfs: fix possible memory leak in iio_sysfs_trig_init()
OSV.details:
